typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	detect_col as string[] (['SALARY','EMP_ID'])
}
source(output(
		EMP_ID as short,
		NAME as string,
		SALARY as short,
		DEPT_ID as short,
		LOC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(each(match(type=='short'), $$ = toInteger($$)),
		each(match(type=='string'), $$ = trim($$)),
		hike = SALARY*10/100,
		column2 = :default_value,
		default_value := 'reserved') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(EMP_ID,
		DEPT_ID),
	SALARY = sum(SALARY),
		NAME = first(NAME),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Aggregate1
